description.en:
Aoshima's (Aoshima Bunka Kyozaisha) science fiction plastic model series fascinated boys in the 1970s and 1980s. The manga version by Eiji Imami himself, who designed many of the mechas, has been made into an electronic comic! The Aoshima Comics series, which was published as a book in all 5 volumes, has been reorganized, and short stories published in advertising articles, booklets with plastic models, etc. are also included. 

Volume 1 ``Space Carrier Red Hawk''...In 2110, an alien was on board a UFO that crash-landed on the Izu Peninsula, warning of a crisis for the Earth!! The fate of the galaxy is now at stake in the revenge of Gilders, who was chased from Earth. Fight, our space carrier Red Hawk!! This is the story of the star chasers that begins now. ＜Special Appendix “Combined Robot Atranger Tiger Shark”＞

Volume 2 "Red Hawk Yamato PART II"...Humanity is now heading to the ocean of infinite space in search of dreams, science, adventure, love and hope!! In 2111, a new enemy appears before humanity. !! Sunshine Blaster that does its utmost in destruction!! Only 3 months left on Earth, go, Red Hawk Yamato II!! ＜Special Appendix ``Combined Robot Atranger''＞

Volume 3 ``Red Hawk Combined Fleet''... A huge explosion of a tanker, a mysterious aircraft accident, and a major earthquake!! The Earth in 2112 AD is in its greatest crisis!! The Fox Corps plots to conquer humanity. A desperate Earth Defense Force stands in front of us!! Come on, move on, Red Hawk Combined Fleet!! <Special Recording: Combined Giant Ship Yamato>

Volume 4 “Red Hawk Shired”... “I am the one who will save the Earth from its crisis!!” One day, Hajime, a boy who suddenly becomes a warrior to protect the Earth!! However, the attacks of the Mugen Empire, an invader from future space, continue endlessly!! Standing battle robot Shiaard!! And fight for humanity!! <Special recording "Countach Story">
 Volume 5 "Ancient Robot Godaiger"...His name is Tsuyoshi Takeda. He wanders onto Earth from space in the year 2113, but is surprised to find a demonic titan plotting to invade Earth. When the peaceful Earth was to be ruled by these guys, I decided to protect it with Godaiger, an ancient robot of justice! ! <Special recording> 1: “Hoero! Countach” 2: Illustration Gallery 3: Work Commentary
